plot outline: Sathya "Ashwin Kumar" is a bright student who is extraordinary talented in studies and created his own software project of an online voting system. He wanted to use this application in the forthcoming college elections. However the circumstances pushing him to contest the elections by himself. Priya "Manisha Jith" his co-student and friend joins him in all his endeavours and becomes his lover. Deva "Sathyan" son of a politician contests against Sathya and manages very little participation of voting members and tries to win the election. As a measure of principle manual voting is implemented in the election, however the principal allows parallel demo of online voting system and Sathya wins in the online system election where most of the people voted. Thennavan "Elanthirumaran Periasamy" the chief election commissioner appreciates the efforts of Sathya and offers him a job as well. Sathya and Priya celebrates in the felicitation function of Sathya.
title: Inaiya Thalaimurai
plot: Sathya "Ashwin Kumar" is a bright student in a college proves that minimum participation and partial voting is a curse of democracy and 100% voting will deliver good leaders using his innovation.

Sathya "Ashwin Kumar" is a bright student who is extraordinary talented in studies and created his own software project of an online voting system. He wanted to use this application in the forthcoming college elections. However the circumstances pushing him to contest the elections by himself. Priya "Manisha Jith" his co-student and friend joins him in all his endeavours and becomes his lover. Deva "Sathyan" son of a politician contests against Sathya and manages very little participation of voting members and tries to win the election. As a measure of principle manual voting is implemented in the election, however the principal allows parallel demo of online voting system and Sathya wins in the online system election where most of the people voted. Thennavan "Elanthirumaran Periasamy" the chief election commissioner appreciates the efforts of Sathya and offers him a job as well. Sathya and Priya celebrates in the felicitation function of Sathya.::Elanthirumaran Periasamy
